lines.text: Whoo. I'm runnin' things, I'm running things. Yo! This is the spot! I'm here every week, every week. I got it goin' on up in here, y'all. I had a ball.
Naw, man, I think you had 2 balls. He had so many balls, he could have played pool up in his place.
What? Oh, y'all's playin' pool again? You can't beat him, boy, leave him alone. Hey, did y'all check out Phyllis?
Didn't you see "The Crying Game"? Didn't you look at the neck?
Yeah, I checked out the neck. I'm the one that put them hickies on it. I been suckin' on it all night.
Hop, they were *all men*. Yo, it's time to go, man. Don't call me no more.
You need to rent "The Crying Game."

[accidentally in a transvestite nightclub]
That was a *dude* in that dress!

[in a transvestite nightclub]
Um, excuse me. Um, I don't mean to be rude, but is that a paper bag that you're wearing?

[wearing what looks like a low cut, fashion-designer mini-dress, made out of brown paper]
Ah, well, as a matter of fact, it is. I'm a designer / slash / astrologist. Trust, I believe in all that cosmic carrying on, and woo-la-la. Cluck!
